page.title: 09DARTMOUTH'S SHOPS
page.content: There are about{154}shops, hairdressers, banks and building societies in{Dartmouth. The most common type are{clothes {shops:}there are{22.}The main clothes shops for ladies are Arcadia, Clouds, Hazels Fashion and for men Mr Melvyns and Riverside Fashion. Cafes and pubs come a close second with{21.}This probably shows how important tourism is to Dartmouth. Food shops are also important, accounting for{19}of the total. The largest food shop is the International store in Fairfax place. In{1985}so far, seven new shops have opened: a photographer's, a furniture shop, a jeweller's, three more clothes shops and a carpet shop. Many shops cater for Dartmouth's {tourists.
